PROJECT.NAME: ihDacCocc
PROJECT.TITLE: Dactylopius coccus, genomic and transcriptomic data.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project collects the genomic and transcriptomic data generated for Dactylopius coccus to facilitate genome assembly and annotation as part of the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/) and organised by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) initiative.

PROJECT.NAME: ihDacCocc15
PROJECT.TITLE: Dactylopius coccus, genome assembly, ihDacCocc15.
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: This project provides the genome assembly of Dactylopius coccus. The assembly is provided by the European Reference Genome Atlas (ERGA, https://www.erga-biodiversity.eu/) via the Biodiversity Genomics Europe project (BGE, https://biodiversitygenomics.eu/).
